short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Earn rewards when searching for your favorite stores and products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rewards extension is the easiest way to earn extra cash for doing what you already do every day - searching and shopping online. With the Rewards extension enabled, earn points daily for searching in your browser.

Easy access to your rewards
Earn extra cash
See your points balance
Convert point to cash once you reach your goals


Withdraw rewards from your BeFrugal account together with your cash back. Rewards Extension is a search extension that allows you to earn extra cash, powered by Yahoo. 

Through this extension, you can view your points balance, redeem points for cash and gift cards, and access points history.
